allTypes.title: ðŸ§© All AI Skill Types
allTypes.subtitle: Explore eight AI personality types and understand your skill profile
allTypes.flipHint: Click card to view cat image ðŸ±
allTypes.theoryTitle: ðŸ“Š Theoretical Method for Calculating Weighted Scores
allTypes.dimensionDesc: Each dimension's score is calculated through the following steps:
allTypes.questionGrouping: Question Grouping: Group questions in the questionnaire by 8 dimensions
allTypes.singleScore: Single Question Score: Calculate score (0-10) based on user answers using each question's scoring function
allTypes.dimensionAverage: Dimension Average: Calculate the average score of all questions in that dimension
allTypes.identityWeight: Identity Weight: Apply corresponding weight matrix based on user's selected identity role
allTypes.dimensionScoreFormula: Dimension Score = Î£(Single Question Score) / Number of Questions
allTypes.weightedScoreFormula: Weighted Score = Dimension Score Ã— Identity Weight
allTypes.identityWeightsDesc: Different identity roles value each dimension differently. The weight matrix is as follows:
allTypes.personalityTypeDesc: Based on scores from three core dimensions, determine user's personality type:
allTypes.aVsC: If A Score > C Score, then Abstract (A), otherwise Concrete (C)
allTypes.bScore: B Score = (Information Radar Score + Learning Agility Score) / 2
allTypes.dScore: D Score = (Theoretical Insight Score + Engineering Execution Score) / 2
allTypes.bVsD: If B Score > D Score, then Breadth (B), otherwise Depth (D)
allTypes.oScore: O Score = (AI Collaboration Score + Influence Voice Score) / 2
allTypes.iVsO: If I Score > O Score, then Independent (I), otherwise Collaborative (O)
allTypes.typeCodeFormula: Type Code = (A or C) + (B or D) + (I or O)
allTypes.typeCodeExample: For example: A-B-O represents Abstract-Breadth-Collaborative type, i.e., "Theory Evangelist"
allTypes.additionalTraitDesc: If Expression Aesthetics Score â‰¥ 8.0, gain "Refined" additional trait, and "Refined" prefix will be added before personality type.
